statements: UPDATE gis_data SET location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(45.5608 -122.6308)') WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE visualization_settings SET theme = 'Dark' WHERE user_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE users SET username='John Doe', email='johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE locations SET latitude=40.7128, longitude=74.0060, location_name='New York City' WHERE location_id=1;
